Ae Watan Mere Watan review: An important.content: It is the time of World War II and the British Indian government has banned all private radio channels.The censorship of radio in 1942 with the British government using the medium for its propaganda resonates even now.After all, it narrates the story of a young girl in Mumbai whose efforts led to the transmission of Congress underground radio in 1942, just before the Quit India movement.The idea is to motivate Indians to freedom struggle and take up action against British atrocities.A biopic on Usha Mehta, an unsung hero of the Indian freedom struggle, the film perhaps held a lot of potential on paper.

Shakira says it's 'better not to have a.content: It's been more than two years since the Columbian singer announced her breakup with her footballer ex-boyfriend, Gerard Piqué Bernabeu.The former couple dated for 11 years and during their time together, they had welcomed two sons: Milan, 11, and Sasha, 9.“In a way, it’s kind of good not to have a husband because that… I don’t know why it was dragging me down, man,” the “Hips Don’t Lie” singer said.Shakira has never shied away from talking about her life after breaking up with ex-partner Gerard Piqué.Speaking with Zane Lowe on Apple Music 1, Shakira, 47, talked about why she chose not to get married.

Blade Runner actor M Emmet Walsh dies at.content: His publicist Cynthia Snyder said in a statement, “In a remarkable career spanning six decades on stage, in film and television, he became widely recognized for his standout portrayals of such memorable characters.” Walsh had a remarkable career spanning over six decades and has been part of many blockbuster movies like Ridley Scott’s 1982 Blade Runner, Critters, and Knives Out among others.Born on March 22, 1935, in Ogdensburg, New York, he started his acting career in theatre, before starting working in TV and film.Film critic Roger Ebert created the “Stanton-Walsh Rule,” saying, “no movie featuring either Harry Dean Stanton or M.Walsh rose to fame in the 1970s, when he played the role of Dickie Dunn in the film Slap Shot.

Pakistani star Sarah Khan thanks Indian.content: As the show grows in popularity, we got in touch with the lead actress of the show, Sarah Khan who plays Gulbano, the woman desired by both friends, played by actors Bilal Abbas Khan and Raza Talish.Pegged as "not another love story", the show focuses on a young woman Gulbano and how two friends Fakhar and Kashif fall for the same woman unknowingly while she is obsessed with an unseen poet who goes by the name of Abdullapur Ka Devdas.It is a 13-episode series which stars Bilal Abbas, Raza Talish and Sarah Khan.The Indian film industry, particularly Bollywood, has produced some timeless classics and contemporary masterpieces.WION: Do you consume Indian content especially Bollywood?

SS Rajamouli experienced strong earthqua.content: Sharing a photo with an old lady on social media, he wrote that the woman gifted him a handmade thousand origami cranes, "In Japan, they make origami cranes &gift them to their loved ones for good luck& health.His post on X read, "Felt a freaking earthquake in Japan just now!!!''Felt a freaking earthquake in Japan just now!!!''In Japan, they make origami cranes &gift them to their loved ones for good luck& health.SS Rajamouli is currently in Japan with his family including his son SS Karthikeya and the RRR team for the screening of his 2022 movie.

Do Aur Do Pyaar teaser: Vidya Balan star.content:
Do Aur Do Pyaar Teaser 

On Thursday (March 21), the makers dropped the short teaser that took us into the lives of a couple, Kavya and Ani, played by Vidya Balan and Pratik Gandhi.Directed by award-winning filmmaker Shirsha Guha Thakurta, the movie takes us into the quirky world of four people.Earlier, the movie was set to release on March 29.On the other hand, Ani is having an affair with Nora, played by Ileana D'Cruz.However, now the movie has been postponed to April 19.

Sidhu Moosewala's father accuses Punjab.content: Nearly two years after Sidhu Moosewala's tragic demise, Balkaur Singh and his wife Charan Kaur welcomed a baby boy on March 17.Balkaur Singh, the father of late Punjabi singer Sidhu Moosewala, has accused the Punjab government of harassing him over the birth of his newborn son.Most couples would likely have health-related issues in their 60s and 70s which may incapacitate them from playing an active role in parenting in the formative years of children born to couples in their 50s," he added.As far as the law of the land is concerned, I want to tell you that my son respected the law during his 28 years of life.Dr Rohit Gutgutia, Medical Director of Nova IVF Fertility, told WION, "Pregnancy can worsen preexisting health conditions in elderly couples, such as diabetes and hypertension, which can hurt the health of the baby.

You wouldn't be able to guess the stagge.content: Tamannaah Bhatia looked like a doll as she recently stepped out wearing a soft pink gown by the luxury label Versace.Tamannaah's pastel pink outfit features satin fabric, draped jersey panels, a plunging neckline, a sleeveless design accented with Medusa '95 hardware on one shoulder and a striking thigh-high side slit.Assisted by celebrity fashion stylist Leepakshi Ellawadi, Tamannaah accessorised her look with a pair of pearl statement earrings and a matching pair of blush-pink pumps.She was helped in the makeup department by artist Florian Hurel who gave her a makeover with pink eyeshadow, mascara-covered lashes and a nude lipstick.Just a day prior, she wowed fans in a stunning black corset outfit.

American fitness guru Richard Simmons ba.content: The 80’s legend Richard Simmons is back in the news after he revealed that he’s been diagnosed with skin cancer.Richard also revealed that he underwent a procedure where the “cancer doctor” had to "burn" his skin with a small instrument to "remove the cancer cells.He comes back about 20 minutes later and says the C word.After a while, he returned to the doctor, but the worst wasn’t over as the doctor burned his face again and asked him to come back again." He wrote, “As he started burning my skin a tear dropped down my cheek.

Choli Ke Peeche: Kareena's song from Cre.content: The new song "Choli Ke Peeche" is a collage of the Crew trailer and teaser shots.Kareena Kapoor is channelling Madhuri Dixit so hard in a new song from Crew.The song "Naina" from Crew was released a few days back.It's a new rendition of Ila Arun's song "Ghagra".We promise you when you listen to the song, you will not stop humming it as the new song is both new and offers tribute to the old and original.

Bhaiyya Ji: Meet Manoj Bajpayee's new ba.content: Also read: Paatal Lok 2 to Mirzapur 3: New seasons coming up of these popular showsOn collaborating with Manoj after Sirf Ek Bandaa Kaafi Hai, Apoorv said, "With Bhaiyya Ji, we are embarking on a journey to portray the raw and unfiltered essence of the characters against the backdrop of intense revenge drama and showcase the strength & emotions of family bonds.The ace star will next be seen in action entertainer Bhaiyya Ji in the Apoorv Singh Karki directorial.Manoj will return to the screen after his praise-worthy ZEE5 courtroom drama Sirf Ek Banda Kaafi Hai in which he fights for justice for a victim of rape and abuse.After a hard-hitting subject of Sirf Ek Bandaa Kaafi Hai, I wanted to explore a completely different style of cinema and Bhaiyya Ji was the apt film."Also read: In pics: Priyanka Chopra, Nick Jonas and Malti Marie visit Ayodhya

New character posters from House of Drag.content: "Also read: From Demon Slayer to My Hero Academia: All anime releases in Spring 2024, date and where to watchLike before, House of the Dragon season 2 will be available on HBO and will stream on Max.It was previously reported by Deadline that House of the Dragon showrunner Ryan Condal will have season 2 pick up “where we left off”.The first character posters from House of the Dragon season 2 are a treat for the eyes as HBO’s Game of Thrones prequel comes back heavy.The new posters of House of the Dragon season 2 are out and the makers have made it quite difficult for fans to choose between the two factions.What we do expect from the upcoming season is a lot of sudden deaths, murders and revenge as Team Green and Team Black are vying for each other’s blood after a climactic ending to season 1.

Sundance Film Festival announces dates f.content: With the next year’s fest scheduled for later in January and into February, it inches closer to dates for the Berlin Film Festival.Dates for Sundance 2025 are finally set as the Sundance Institute announced that the film festival will take place from January 23 to February 2.In its announcement, director of the Sundance, Eugene Hernandez said, “While the next Sundance Film Festival is still 10 months away, we’re already laying the foundation for the 2025 edition, looking ahead to sharing a new group of artists’ work with audiences at the start of next year.We’ll see you next year January 23–February 2, 2025.It is the largest independent film festival in the US.

From Demon Slayer to My Hero Academia: A.content:
Here's your one-stop guide to the Spring 2024 anime series schedule, release time and where to watch them.The winter season of anime this year was somewhat underwhelming with only Solo Leveling topping the charts, but fans are looking forward to the upcoming Spring of 2024 with high expectations.April 1
Gods’ Games We Play
Where to watch: TBA
Release Time:  21:30There are many exciting titles to look forward to, such as the much-anticipated Demon Slayer: Hashira Training Arc and the blockbuster hit, Blue Lock.

Dhanush to star in biopic of veteran mus.content: Actor Dhanush will be starring in what he calls a dream project in his career, the biopic of veteran musician, composer and singer, Ilaiyaraja, who continues to contribute to the field of music for nearly five decades.com/UvMnWRuh9XSharing a promotional poster of the film on X, formerly known as Twitter, Dhanush expressed it was an honour for him to play the veteran musician on screen.Referring to the big challenge and responsibility of playing the veteran musician in the biopic, Dhanush expressed optimism that Ilaiyarajaa's music would guide and teach him on how to act, as it had done all these years.Veteran actor Kamal Haasan, and veteran director Bharathiraja, among others were part of the film's promotional event held on Wednesday (Mar 20), in Chennai.Directed by Arun Matheswaran, whom Dhanush had worked with in his recent outing 'Captain Miller', the Ilaiyarajaa biopic will have cinematography by veteran lensman Nirav Shah.

In pics: Priyanka Chopra, Nick Jonas and.content: After a busy night with Prime Video’s multiple films and shows announcement event, global sensation Priyanka Chopra was spotted in Ayodhya at Ram Mandir with her husband Nick Jonas and their daughter Malti Marie.Actor Priyanka Chopra Jonas, husband and singer Nick Jonas and their daughter Maltie Marie Jonas offered prayers at Ram Janmabhoomi Temple in Ayodhya, Uttar Pradesh.The couple offered their prayers at the beautiful temple with their two-year-old daughter.Priyanka attended a Bulgari event and then made time for Prime Video Presents event in Mumbai where she showcased her upcoming production venture Women of My Billion.She was joined by Nick two days later.

Priyanka Chopra reunites with Karan Joha.content:
Priyanka Chopra's new project

Priyanka was at the Prime Video Presents event on Tuesday to launch her new project- a documentary called Women of My Billion which her production banner Purple Pebble Pictures has produced.Priyanka Chopra and Karan Johar reunited publicly on Amazon Prime Video event on Tuesday in Mumbai.In the viral video, Priyanka Chopra and Karan Johar can be seen sharing the stage before the actress attempted to leave the stage.A year back, however, PC had spoken about how she was compelled to move to the US due to the various camps in Bollywood.The two seems to have put their grievances behind as PC even made an appearance on Koffee With Karan a few seasons back.

Oscar-winning director Jonathan Glazer f.content: Looks like Jonathan Glazer has found some support from the rest of Hollywood which doesn’t think that his Oscars speech after winning Best International Feature Film for The Zone of Interest was out of place.”After winning Best Film in the International Feature category, Jonathan walked up on the stage and said, “Our film shows where dehumanisation leads at its worst.”Directors Asif Kapadia and Jesse Peretz also expressed support for Jonathan Glazer’s speech.The band Massive Attack also posted on X, “Jonathan Glazer is a filmmaker of the highest integrity, craft & bravery.The filmmaker started this week on a low after nearly 500 Jewish celebrities issued a letter denouncing his Oscars speech as they wrote: “We refute our Jewishness being hijacked for the purpose of drawing a moral equivalence between a Nazi regime that sought to exterminate a race of people and an Israeli nation that seeks to avert its own extermination.

Paatal Lok 2 to Mirzapur 3: New seasons.content:
Jaideep Ahlawat and Ishwaak Singh will be back to reprise their roles in the second season of Paatal Lok.Paatal Lok Season 2

Hathi Ram is going to be back.Tilottama Shome also joins the cast this season.
